definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: flour, meal;—abs. ´[[ק]]: 1Sa 1:24 +, [[קָָמַח]] Is 47:2; cstr. [[קֶמַח]] Nu 5:15;—Ju Jdg 6:19 (material for unleavened cakes), 1Sa 1:24, 1Sa 28:24, 2Ki 4:41; defined by [[סׂלֶת]] (q. v.) Ge 18:6, disting. fr. [[סׂלֶת]]1Ki 5:2; of barley ([[שְׂעׂרִים]]) Nu 5:15 (P), but 2Sa 17:28 + [[חִטִּם]], [[שְׂעׂרִים]], [[קָלִי]]; + other articles of food 1Ch 12:41 (van d. H. v:1Ch 12:40); kept in a) [[כַּד]] 1Ki 17:12, 1Ki 17:14, 1Ki 17:16; made by grinding Is 47:2; [[חֶמַחבְּלִי]] ´[[ק]]: Ho 8:7.
